cause.description:
Rabbi Keller and his family have spent countless hours raising money For The Sefer Torah that is being written in Bentzions Memory, Unfortunately they are still short by a substantial amount.
Bentzion was a dear friend to many of us, And we all miss him & love him. Let us show our respect by helping out in his memory.
Remember, every dollar helps!
Tizku Lemitzvos & may we see Bentzion & each other In yerusholaim very soon!
1. Smile for Bentzion!
2. Do A Mitzvah For Bentzion!
cause.mission: Raise enough money to pay for the Sefer Torah.
cause.name: Bentzion Keller Sefer Torah
